title: Ragged Caster
summaries: The Ragged Caster is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that spawns in the Dungeon after Plantera is defeated. Ragged Casters attack by firing three homing Lost Soul projectiles at the player which inflict the Blackout debuff for 2–6 / 4–12 / 5–15 seconds, decelerating as the projectiles approach the player. Blackout is a stronger version of the Darkness debuff, greatly lowering the player's light vision. Ragged Casters teleport to a different location on-screen after firing six rounds of projectiles or immediately upon being hit.
Ragged Casters are most common in Dungeon areas with <linked>Slab Walls</linked>, as indicated by the <linked>Ragged Brotherhood Sigils</linked> present within these sections.
